comment: Farm murders in two attacks only hours apart were reported by Ian Cameron on Twitter. This comes shortly after Cyril Ramaphosa denied these killings at the U.N.
amr:
# ::snt Farm murders in two attacks only hours apart were reported by Ian Cameron on Twitter. This comes shortly after Cyril Ramaphosa denied these killings at the U.N.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / report-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Ian"
                        :op2 "Cameron"))
            :ARG1 (m2 / murder-01
                  :ARG1 (f / farm)
                  :time (a / attack-01
                        :quant 2
                        :mod (a2 / apart)
                        :duration (m3 / multiple
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (h / hour))
                              :mod (o / only))))
            :medium (p2 / publication
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Twitter")))
      :snt2 (c / come-03
            :ARG1 (t2 / this)
            :time (a3 / after
                  :op1 (d / deny-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Cyril"
                                    :op2 "Ramaphosa"))
                        :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                              :mod t2))
                  :location (o2 / organization
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "United"
                              :op2 "Nations")))
            :ARG1-of (s / short-07)))
